channel.title: [pi] public void process (need a new place)

item.title: [pi] public void process (need a new place)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[code][quote=“emtrescue, post:5, topic:401594”]its this http://www.google.org/2046309-post7.html

its to add the real home tele[/quote]

It should be written to just have a long for the last time the player did it. Then if the player clicks the button, check if the change in time is greater than 30 minutes (or whichever amount of time you want). If it is, teleport them, and set the last time to the current time. If not, send a message saying you have X minutes remaining.

I posted something similar [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498361.msg3644484.html#msg3644484]here[/code]. It’s not the exact code, but it should give you an idea on how to do it. That way, it completely removes the need for any event manager.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] public void process (need a new place)

homeTele--;
}

item.title: [pi] public void process (need a new place)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:1, topic:401594”]I have some much stuff in my processess i need to put them elsewhere but i run into an issue wherever i seem to place them it doesnt work it only works in process

for exzample

if (homeTeleDelay > 0){ homeTeleDelay--; } if (homeTele > 0 && homeTeleDelay <= 0){ homeTeleport(3222, 3218, 0); homeTele--; }

i need to move these elsewhere but i cant find where it works, i tried there own void but it doesnt do anything idk, can they work anywhere else?[/quote]

Using a proper event manager would certainly fix it.
